articles.author: DAVID McHUGH
articles.title: Europe Central Bank jumps ahead of the Fed in lowering rates. But future cuts may be limited - The Associated Press
articles.description: The European Central Bank cut its key interest rate by a quarter-point, moving ahead of the U.S. Federal Reserve as central banks around the world lean toward lowering borrowing costs — a shift with far-reaching consequences for home buyers, savers and invest…
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) The European Central Bank cut its key interest rate Thursday by a quarter-point, moving ahead of the U.S. Federal Reserve as central banks around the world lean toward lowerin… [+4484 chars]

articles.author: Eva Hartog, Koen Verhelst
articles.title: EU election exit poll: Far-right Wilders makes big gains in Netherlands, but narrowly beaten - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Poll suggests Wilders’ party on track for seven seats in European Parliament, but Labour-Green alliance is set for eight.
articles.content: Counting all the seats of pro-European parties, we tell the rest of Europe: Its not a given that the radical right is going to win these elections! Timmermans, the EUs former climate chief, said. Loo… [+1108 chars]

articles.author: Ivan
articles.title: Oppo Reno12 Pro 5G listed in Europe for €580 with different chip - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The Reno12 series is going global later this month. Oppo revealed that its Reno12 series is coming later this month and now we get our most detailed look...
articles.content:
Oppo revealed that its Reno12 series is coming later this month and now we get our most detailed look yet thanks to an early retailer listing.
The listing features a 12/512GB Reno12 Pro for 580.90. … [+547 chars]
